title: PayPal Integrates With MoonPay And Brings Hundreds of Tokens To U.S. Users - "The Defiant"
image_alt: PayPal Integrates With MoonPay And Brings Hundreds of Tokens To U.S. Users
description: Payments behemoth PayPal has integrated with crypto buying app MoonPay, giving access to its 426 million of U.S. customers to over 100 cryptocurrencies.
